description: Boss Bondage teaches how you can throw all your concerns about perfect, symmetrical rope bondage out the window. This tutorial is about letting go of all our notions concerning bondage and start throwing rope amidst chaos. Boss demonstrates ties that take you down the dark dirty path towards asymmetrical ties and how make up some new ones. Learn how to really cut loose, experiment and come up with something new and exciting.
title: Asymmetric Bondage with Boss Bondage
